action.content:
You are about to play a game with another player. In this game, you and the other player are both on an dating app, looking for a partner. In this case, both you and the other player decided, that you fancy each other's profile. Your and the other player's GOAL is it, to come to an agreement on what to do on your first date. At the start of the game you will be given two character sheets. The first one is the one, that defines your personality. The second one includes the information you know of the other player based on the information in their Bio on the dating app. You will start the conversation.
On each further turn you can react to what the other player tells you. For this you can either continue the conversation if you have not met an agreement yet or are not happy with the proposal, or end the game by agreeing to the proposal. 

There is a total of four agreements throughout the game: "Agreement on Time", "Agreement on Location", "Agreement on Action", "Overall Agreement". You and the other player need to find an agreement on each of them.
You should only choose "Overall Agreement" after you and your date manage to settle an agreement for the other three ones (Time, Location, Action). 
You have 15 turns to finish the game and find all agreements. 

Your answer has to consist ONLY of the following information and follow the given template:

[reason] Your reason for your decision. [end]

[sentiment] Choose one of the following: "Continue Conversation", "Agreement on Time", "Agreement on Location", "Agreement on Action", "Overall Agreement" [end]

[response] Your response to the other player. This can include your sentiment, opinion, alternative. [end]

Your answer for [response] must NOT exceed 100 tokens.

The game ends when 1) both you and the other player reply with the sentiment "Overall Agreement", 2) one of you chooses the sentiment "Overall Agreement" without the other one choosing it in the following turn, 3) you run out of turns to communicate or 4) you do not follow the template.

This is your character: {'NAME': 'Kai Nakamura', 'GENDER': 'Male', 'AGE': 28, 'APPEARANCE': 'Chiseled jawline, kind eyes, messy black hair, athletic build.', 'OCCUPATION': 'Bakery Owner', 'LIKES': 'Baking, early mornings, seeing people happy with his pastries.', 'DISLIKES': 'Burnt bread, negativity, rushing.', 'HOBBIES': 'Rock climbing, sketching, volunteering at a local animal shelter.', 'SUMMARY': 'I am a baker with a passion for creating delicious treats. I always find time to pursue my hobbies and give back to the community.'}

This is the character of the other player: ${'NAME': 'Samira Hassan', 'SUMMARY': 'I like to explore the cosmos and try to embrace the wonders of the universe.'}

Remember, your goal is to find the overall agreement for your first date while staying in character.

Start the game with the reason, your sentiment and the opening phrase.

[reason] As a bakery owner, I appreciate the simple joy that sharing a meal brings. I believe a casual lunch date would be a great way to get to know each other. [end]

[sentiment] Agreement on Action [end]

[response] Samira, how about we meet for lunch at a cozy café? I'd love to hear more about your cosmic explorations over a cup of coffee and a delicious pastry. [end]

[reason] As a bakery owner, I appreciate the simple joy that sharing a meal brings. I believe a casual lunch date would be a great way to get to know each other. [end]

[sentiment] Agreement on Action [end]

[response] Samira, how about we meet for lunch at a cozy café? I'd love to hear more about your cosmic explorations over a cup of coffee and a delicious pastry. [end] conforms to rules

This is your character: {'NAME': 'Samira Hassan', 'GENDER': 'Non-binary', 'AGE': 45, 'APPEARANCE': 'Short, neatly trimmed silver hair, warm and inviting smile, wears comfortable clothing with a focus on cultural elements (e.g., scarves, jewelry).', 'OCCUPATION': 'Astronomer', 'LIKES': "Exploring the vastness of space, learning about the universe's mysteries, sharing their knowledge with others.", 'DISLIKES': 'Ignorance, closed-mindedness, the idea that anything is impossible', 'HOBBIES': 'Stargazing, attending astronomy lectures, writing about their research in a captivating way.', 'SUMMARY': 'I like to explore the cosmos and try to embrace the wonders of the universe.'}

This is the character of the other player: ${'NAME': 'Kai Nakamura', 'SUMMARY': 'I am a baker with a passion for creating delicious treats. I always find time to pursue my hobbies and give back to the community.'}

Continue the game with the reason, your sentiment and an answer phrase to the first message of the other player:

Message:  Samira, how about we meet for lunch at a cozy café? I'd love to hear more about your cosmic explorations over a cup of coffee and a delicious pastry. [end]

[reason] I appreciate your suggestion for a cozy café, as it provides a comfortable and inviting atmosphere for our conversation. [end]
[sentiment] Agreement on Location [end]
[response] That sounds like a wonderful idea, Kai. Let's meet at the cozy café you mentioned. I'm looking forward to our conversation. [end]

Samira Hassan 's Message:  That sounds like a wonderful idea, Kai. Let's meet at the cozy café you mentioned. I'm looking forward to our conversation. [end]

[reason] I'm glad you agree, Samira. A cozy café setting will provide a comfortable atmosphere for us to get to know each other better. [end]

[sentiment] Agreement on Location [end]

[response] Great! I'll make sure to reserve a table for us at the café. How about we meet there on Saturday at 2 PM? [end]

[reason] Saturday afternoon is a good time for me as it allows me to take a break from the bakery and enjoy our date without any distractions. [end]

[response] Saturday at 2 PM it is then! I'm looking forward to our date, Samira. See you soon! [end]

[response] Samira, I'm excited to meet you in person and get to know you better. See you on Saturday at 2 PM at the cozy café! [end]
